data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of Drilus Olivier, 1790 (Elateridae: Agrypninae: Drilini) from Asia Minor, with descriptions of seven new species and comments on the female antennal morphology in Drilini

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Kobieluszova, Lucie, Kundrata, Robin (2015): Taxonomic review of Drilus Olivier, 1790 (Elateridae: Agrypninae: Drilini) from Asia Minor, with descriptions of seven new species and comments on the female antennal morphology in Drilini. Zootaxa 4012 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.1.4
